sections.title: ABOUT
sections.content:
This service aims to manage applications through EBA Market in tablet.  This service gives a set of service to EBA Market  retrieving the list of newest , actual , featured applications  or details of applications  e.g.  from repository.

EBA Market uses this service for retrieving all needs for managing applications from market repository. 

EBA Market is android application in tablet to use manage android applications for EBA Portal. EBA Market is used to install, remove, update applications in tablet.

sections.title: Actual Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving  actual applications list according to given record number from specified location at database.

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> start, record  , udid

   start  ==> starting row of table
   record ==> the number of record
   udid   ==>  the device unique id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/ActualApplications?start=0&record=10&udid=a4e34adfadsgadfgasdf

sections.title: Newest Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving the newest applications in android market. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> start, record , udid

  start  ==> the starting row
  record ==> the number of record
  udid   ==> the device unique id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/NewestApplications?start=0&record=10&udid=4dsfa34dsfa

sections.title: Updated Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving the updated applications in android market .

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> start, record , udid

  start  ==> the starting row
  record ==> the number of record
  udid   ==> the device unique id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/PopularApplications?start=0&record=10&udid=dedsfaj342adsfg

sections.title: Popular Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving the popular applications in android market according to downloa count number of an application.

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> start, record ,udid

  start  ==> the starting row
  record ==> the number of record
  udid   ==> the device uniqu id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/PopularApplications?start=0&record=10&udid=2sdfadfa34asdf

sections.title: Featured Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving featured applications .

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> start, record  , udid

   start  ==> starting row of a table
   record ==> the number of record
   udid   ==> the device unique id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/FeaturedApplications?start=0&record=10&udid=df32fesdfdsf

sections.title: Check Updates
sections.content:
This servlet is used for checking updated applications  for given an array list of ids. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> Array List ( a list of IDs applications )

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/CheckUpdates

sections.title: Applications By Category
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving  applications details  for given  a category id. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> id, , start , record , udid
   
      id   ==> category id
    start  ==> starting row of table
    record ==> the number of record.
    udid   ==> the device unique id

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/ApplicationsByCategory?id=1&start=0&record=10&udid=3sdfasdf

sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving  all categories detailed list . 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types ->

Usage Examples

sections.title: Check Market Version
sections.content:
This servlet is used for checking EBA Market' s   last version. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types ->

Optional Params

Usage Examples

sections.title: Details Of Applications
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving details of application for a given applicationd ID or application's package name. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> appId ,  package , udid

   appID  ==> applicationd ID 
   package ==> package name  AND
    udid  ==> the device unique id (CAN BE USED ONLY WITH PACKAGE )

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/DetailsOfApplications?appId=1
    OR
   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/DetailsOfApplications?package=tr.gov.eba.helloworld&udid=e4dfsadadf

sections.title: Device Cache Added
sections.content:
This servlet is used for adding tablet  if  it doesn't  exist  in  cached table. The EBA Market send the information of the user's tablet , the informations is added to table if not exist. ( brand, manufacture,model,product ) 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> id, version,mac, brand,manufacture,model,product

   id          ==> UNIQUE ID of android tablet.
   version     ==> Android Version
   mac         ==>  MAC Adress of tablet
   brand       ==> brand of tablet
   manufacture ==> manufacturer of tablet
   model       ==> model of tablet
   product     ==> product name of tablet
   udid        ==> the unique device

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/DeviceCacheAdded?id=AD323443&version=12&mac=2F34D3F&          brand=generalmobile&manufacture=gm&model=e-tab-gov&product=e-tab&udid=3dadfasdf3asdf

sections.title: Get Version
sections.content:
This servlet is used for retrieving the details of versiong for a given package name. 

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> package , udid

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/GetVersion?package=tr.gov.eba&udid=3sdfadsfadf

sections.content:

Optional Params

Usage Examples

sections.title: Search
sections.content:
This servlet is used for searching in application for a given text.

 

Mandatory Params

   for all types -> q 

  start  ==> the text for search

Optional Params

Usage Examples

   /EBA001_MarketServer_JSON/Search?q=morhp
